2089790.name: V3: KOMMANDO (Tech Preview)
2089790.description:
This technical test for Kommando is meant to stress test the current build and get player feedback about basic mechanics, movement, and gunplay. The vision for Kommando is centred around "back to basics" competitive gameplay where players will experience tactical, team-based gameplay in settings from around the world while playing as some of the most recognized and prestigious counter-terrorism and law enforcement units. The core experience will revolve around small team operations in a highly competitive multiplayer setting where communication and tactics matter.

This game is being developed by a small development team with the assistance of competitive FPS players to bring you the most authentic experience possible.
2089790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
